body:
Updates to CGAL:
- Add latest version
- Link to Qt
- Be more explicit about missing dependencies
- Simplify install instructions to be more in line with http://doc.cgal.org/latest/Manual/installation.html

Updates to ICU4C:
- Switch from sourceforge to ICU's own download page
  - Sourceforge link wasn't working for me
- Add latest version
- Switch version numbering scheme from underscores to dots
- Add `url_for_version` so that other versions can be downloaded
- Add `make check` to prevent unforeseen problems later on
title: Updates to CGAL and ICU4C packages
